title: Phi-4-multimodal and Phi-4-mini
description: Microsoft introduces Phi-4-multimodal & Phi-4-mini! 🚀 Phi-4-multimodal integrates speech, vision & text for seamless interactions, while Phi-4-mini excels in text tasks with high accuracy. Now available on Azure AI Foundry, HuggingFace & NVIDIA API Catalog.
